author: kevan
msg: Use 1.0-SNAPSHOT for corba spec. SNAPSHOT will be released prior to G/OpenEJB release

author: dain
msg: JndiRequestHandler was reading client id as an object name when it is really an abstract name.

author: kevan
msg: Use rc4 version of Corba spec. Newer versions don't work with Sun...

author: dblevins
msg: Fix for OPENEJB-140 - Server service "bind" option was ignored
Thanks to Luis Edgardo Duran Lebis for pointing this out

author: jwhitlock
msg: Fix for openejb.bat.  We now check for the presence of a file extension and then trim accordingly.  Again, thanks to Mohammed Nour for finding this.  I tested the 6 scenarios I could think of so this should be the last fix.
